description: Attribute id is responded to by parameter id with a description: The Spotify ID for the artist
Attribute limit is responded to by parameter limit with a description: The maximum number of items to return
Attribute offset is responded to by parameter offset with a description: The index of the first item to return
Attribute available_markets is responded to by parameter market with a description: The market (an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code)
